comment: Heyy Buddy! You are one of the most sweetest, kind, and caring people I have around me. I loved the way we do illogical debates about things. See you soon whenever you come to Bangalore...and dogs ko itna mat bigadoooo pleaseee!!!!! All the best for your future, Mr Scientist :)
name: Trupti U Rathod

comment: Hey kunal! Very caring , football lover and sweet person. Please don't eat too much oreo cookies. Kunal tumne  meri bhut help ki h in 2 sal mein, or meri health ki care krna, Kunal plz apni health ka dhyan rkha kar! I wish for all the happiness that u deserves.
